snippet.title: Mega Man 10 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Blue Bomber returns in glorious 8-bit style to battle the Roboenza infection that's produced to a new wave of evil robot masters.  Coming to WiiWare, Xbox Live, and PlayStation Network in 2010!

http://megaman.capcom.com/10/
